mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_store (uk_name, founding_time, introduction) VALUES (#{name}, #{foundingTime}, #{introduction})
mapper.select: SELECT pk_id FROM tb_store WHERE uk_name = #{name}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_store SET uk_name = #{name}, introduction = #{introduction}, address = #{address}, img_url = #{imgUrl} WHERE pk_id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_store WHERE pk_id IN (SELECT store_id FROM tb_store_owner WHERE owner_id = #{ownerId})
